# Wave Plot
```{r creating vector x, include=FALSE}
x = seq(0,20,0.01)
```
```{r creating vector y, include=FALSE}
y=seq(length(x))
for (i in y)
  y[i] = sin(x[i])
```
```{r creating the dataframe,include=FALSE}
sin_df = data.frame(x,y)
```
## Inspecting the data
```{r inspecting the data, echo=FALSE}
head(sin_df,3)
```
## Plotting
```{r plotting the graph, echo=FALSE}
plot(x,y)
```
$$\sin^2(x)+\cos^2(x)=1$$
